de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDeserialisable, IPersistable

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDeserialisable, IPersistable
    A Class which represents a Node, (ControlNode and DataNodes) of thh model. It can be created from an xml and saved to the database.

      • migrate

        public void migrate(int oldFragmentID)
        Migrate datanode- or controlnodeInstances.
        Parameters:

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the type of the node. The Type is the one used inside the XML (ProcessEditor).
        Returns:
        the type of the node.

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Returns the ID of the node. It is the id used inside the XML.
        Returns:
        the id extracted from the XML.

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        This method returns the label of the node. It will be null until it is initialized from the XML.
        Returns:
        the label/text of the node.

      • isGlobal

        public boolean isGlobal()
        Returns true if the node is a global else it returns false.
        Returns:
        Node is globally defined (can be referenced)

      • getDatabaseID

        public int getDatabaseID()
        Returns the database id.
        Returns:
        the id which is primary key of the corresponding database entry.

      • getState

        public java.lang.String getState()
        The state of the node.
        Returns:
        null if node is not a dataNode, else the state.

      • isDataNode

        public boolean isDataNode()
        Returns true if the node is a dataNode.
        Returns:
        Node == dataNode

      • isTask

        public boolean isTask()
        Returns true if the node is a task.
        Returns:
        Node == task

      • getStereotype

        public java.lang.String getStereotype()
        Returns the stereotype.
        Returns:
        the stereotype as a String.

      • setFragmentId

        public void setFragmentId(int newFragmentId)
        Sets the fragment id.
        Parameters:
        newFragmentId - should be the database ID of a fragment.

      • setDatabaseID

        public void setDatabaseID(int newDatabaseID)
        Sets the database id for an Node. Used for DataNodes.
        Parameters:
        newDatabaseID - the new database ID

      • setId

        protected void setId(long newId)
        Sets the Id of the Node. Currently only used by tests.
        Parameters:
        newId - the new id of the data Node.

      • setText

        protected void setText(java.lang.String newLabel)
        Sets the Label of the Node. Currently only used by tests.
        Parameters:
        newLabel - the new label of the data Node.
